Being a patient u need to be more patient when u come to clinic and follow clinic rules

Finally blaming on doctor and hospital staff for all ur mistakes is not at all fair 

Hope all can understand the logic behind this review which is a half baked story 

Next time onwards please be on time before trying to blame others 

Ty
